text: Manua is a Gram panchayat in hajipur, vaishali district, bihar. ==Geography== This panchayat is located at ==Panchayat office== Rajiv Gandhi Seva bhawan Shahzadpur ( राजीव गांधी सेवा भवन Shahzadpur ) Panchayati Raj Department,Government of Bihar page number 7 ==Nearest City/Town== Hajipur (Distance between 7 and 10 KM) village profile census government official website State - Bihar, District- vaishali, Sub District - Hajipur ==Nearest major road highway or river== SH 74 (State highway 74) Map - vaishali district official government website file type: image/jpeg, size:13.9 MB ==compass== The Chief Electoral Officer of Bihar official,hajipur pdf ==Villages in panchayat== There are villages in this panchayatReports of National Panchayat Directory Ministry of Panchayati Raj Government of India List of Census Villages mapped for MANUA Gram Panchayat,HAJIPUR,VAISHALI,BIHAR Report printed on 26/09/2014 National Panchayat Portal,Panchayat Informatics Division {|class="wikitable" |- !s.n | !villages |- | 1||||Phulhara Ishak |- | 2||||Chak Dindayal Chak Rafik |- | 3||||Chak Ahmad |- | 4||||Salemabad |- | 5||||Shahzadpur Jitwar Chak |- | 6||||Manua |- | 7||||Manua Alah Baksh |- | 8||||Manua Khalak Dad |- | 9||||Shahzadpur Jitwar |- | 10||||Manua |- | 11||||Murgia Chak |- | 12||||Chak Khudan |- | 13||||Rae Dih |- | 14||||Shiurampur |- | 15||||Chak Hafiz Amanullah |- | 16||||Chak Mahmudpur Ali Urf Hargobi |- | |} ==References== Category:Villages in Vaishali district Category:Vaishali district Category:Hajipur
